articles.title: Overseas Koreans commemorate Sun's Day
Statement on Sun's Day
Kim Il Sung's work published in Laos
articles.content:
Statement on Sun's Day
   Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The Jordanian preparatory committee to commemorate Sun's Day made public a statement on April 1 calling upon the progressive people of the world to significantly commemorate Sun's Day, the birthday of the President Kim Il Sung.   The statement also urged the South Korean people to rise up in the struggle against the reactionary and separatist authorities of South Korea, upholding the ideas and leadership of the great leader Kim Jong Il, the father of the Korean nation.   It called for continuously advancing for greater victory of the immortal Juche idea.

articles.title: Sun's Day to be commemorated in Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's work published in Laos
    Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The famous work of the President Kim Il Sung "For a Free and Peaceful New World" was published in booklet by the Lao State Publishing House on Monday.   The booklet in the preface says that the work has been published on the occasion of the 87th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people and a close friend of the Lao people, to express deep reverence for him and hand down his exploits through generations.

articles.title: Juche idea study organization formed in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Sun's Day to be commemorated in Equatorial Guinea
   Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- An Equatorial Guinean preparatory committee for commemorating Sun's Day was inaugurated on Monday on the threshold of the 87th birth anniversary of the President Kim Il Sung.    The second prime minister of this country was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.   He said he would devote himself to commemoration activities, saying Sun's Day is a national holiday not only of the Korean people but also of the Equatorial Guinean people.

articles.title: Korean books presented to Cambodia
articles.content:
Juche idea study organization formed in Czech Republic 
    Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- An inaugural meeting of the Czech Group for Study and Embodiment of the Juche Idea was held in Prague on April 6 on the threshold of the 87th birth anniversary of the President Kim Il Sung.   It was noted at the meeting that to deeply study and carry it into reality poses itself as an important issue in building a justifiable new society, because socialism was frustrated in eastern Europe and the international labour movement is undergoing trials.

articles.title: Sun of loyalty and filial piety
articles.content:
Korean books presented to Cambodia
    Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A ceremony for presenting Korean books was held at the Ministry of Culture and art of Cambodia on Monday on the threshold of the 87th birth anniversary of the President Kim Il Sung. At the ceremony the Korean ambassador to Cambodia conveyed celebrated works of the great leaders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and other Korean books to secretary of State for the Ministry Ssyassi Sereyvuth Pannara.   The secretary said it is their honor to receive a lot of precious books on the threshold of the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung.  The books are very precious wealth which will be handed down through generations.

articles.title: Participants in art festival feted
Book on Kim Il Sung's exploits published
articles.content:
Participants in art festival feted
   Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The organizing committee for the 17th April Spring Friendship Art Festival gave a banquet for the festival participants at the People's Palace of Culture on Saturday.   Invited to the banquet were delegations, delegates and artistes of different countries and overseas Korean artistes.   Present were chairman Jang Chol and the vice-chairmen of the organizing committee, and other officials concerned.   Jang Chol made a speech at the banquet.

articles.title: Postal stamps and envelope off press on Sun's Day
articles.content:
Book on Kim Il Sung's exploits published
    Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The Worker's Party of Korea Publishing House Brought out Vol. 11 "Establishment of Socialist Political Method" of the series "Immortal Revolutionary Exploits of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" on the occasion of Sun's Day.  The  President Kim Il Sung put forward unique idea and theory on the socialist political method  and undividedly systematized them.   The book explains in a profound theoretical way the contents and greatness of the President's ideological and theoretical exploits.    Carried in the book are the wisdom and greatness of the President who victoriously led the work to establish the socialist political method.
   It also tells about great change after the establishment of people-centred political method and proves its immortal significance in the cause of independence of the Korean people and the world's progressives.

articles.title: Japan hit for trying to get UNSC permanent seat
articles.content:
Postal stamps and envelope off press on Sun's Day
    Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Commemorative postal stamps and an envelope were released by the Ministry of Post and Telecommunications on the threshold of Sun's Day.   Among the stamps is a sheetlet carrying an august picture of the President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea and the eternal sun of Juche, standing with his face beaming with a broad smile,  and letters "Sun's Day" and "the great leader comrade Kim Il Sung".   There are also stamps which carry a picture of the old home in Mangyongdae where the President was born and spent his childhood, and letters "Juche 1 (1912)", "April 15" and "Juche 88 (1999)" environed with beautiful magnolias. A commemorative envelope portrays the immortal flower "Kimilsungia".
